DOC.brief_summary: Padding with cuff during blood pressure is expected to reduce number of skin crease or petechiae incidence.
DOC.brief_title: Incidences of Cuff-related Trauma After Noninvasive Blood Pressure Measurement Between With and Without Padding
DOC.detailed_description: Objective Primary Outcome : incidences of skin crease or petichiae after noninvasive blood pressure measurement ievery 5 minutes for 1 hour Secondary Outcome : factor related truma after noninvasive blood pressure measurement.
